summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2141, for the improvement of Lafayette Avenue, Beacon Avenue, Eighteenth Avenue South and Nineteenth Avenue South, each from Hanford Street to Hinds Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of cement walks and crosswalks and by the construction of the necessary curbs and gutters and grading, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 21540 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
